name: Weekend Brunch
description: From Bellinis to Breakfast Pizzas, French Toast, Eggs Benedict and Tiramisu, our Brunch Menu is the perfect start to your weekend.

items.name: Semifreddo Bellini
items.description: Blend of frozen peaches & peach schnapps finished with chilled prosecco, garnished with a fresh slice of peach

items.name: Bloody Mary
items.description: Vodka, horseradish, BBQ rub, lemon & lime juice, worcestershire, tabasco, tomato juice, pickle and crispy bacon garnish

items.name: Berry and Elderflower Sparkler
items.description: Black raspberry & elderflower liqueur, elderflower syrup finished with prosecco, garnished with a lime wheel

items.name: Breakfast Pizza
items.description: Pomodoro sauce, fior di latte, ground spicy sausage, caramelized & spring onions, two sunny side up eggs, arugula, pepper, olive oil

items.name: French Toast
items.description: Three slices of Italian loaf sweetened with cinnamon and maple syrup

items.name: Eggs Benedict, Florentine
items.description: Two slices of toasted Italian baguette, spinach, asiago cheese, poached eggs & hollandaise, with house green salad or Italian potatoes

items.name: Italian Potatoes
items.description: Golden potato wedges, diced olives, sundried tomatoes, basil, spring onions, capers & white balsamic vinaigrette

items.name: House Green Salad
items.description: Mixed summer greens, honey-rosemary balsamic vinaigrette, sundried tomatoes, sweety-drop peppers
